text: Vastavika ekhade udaharana denyata allahala lajja-sankoca vatata nahi, maga te udaharana maccharace aso kinva tyahunahi tuccha vastuce. Imana rakhanare tyala apalya palanakartyatarphe satya janatata, ani kaphira (inkara karanare) mhanatata ki asale udaharana denyata allahace prayojana kaya ahe? Yacyacadvare anekanna margabhrasta karato ani bahuteka lokanna satya-margavara anato. Ani margabhrasta tara kevala ajnabhanga karanarya (duracari lokam) naca karato
